content.text: What do you enjoy most about living in japan?
I love the food and the culture.
I agree, the food is amazing. I've been a vegetarian for 10 years, and I've found a lot of great vegetarian options here.
That's great! I'm not a vegetarian, but I love trying new vegetarian dishes.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music. My favorite is probably pop-punk.
I like pop-punk too! I also like rock and hip-hop.
I like rock and hip-hop too. Do you have any favorite bands or artists?
My favorite bands are Green Day and My Chemical Romance. My favorite hip-hop artists are Kendrick Lamar and J. Cole.
I love Green Day! I've seen them in concert a few times. I also like My Chemical Romance. I've never been to a hip-hop concert, but I'd love to go see Kendrick Lamar or J. Cole.
They're both great live! I've seen Kendrick Lamar twice, and he's always amazing. J. Cole is on my list of artists to see live.
I'm sure you'd enjoy seeing J. Cole live. He's a great performer.
